Definition: A slang term used in the Will & Grace sitcom to describe a non-heterosexual marriage, wherein the standard terms "husband" and "wife" do not necessarily fully describe the relationship between the two people being united. Could be applied to male, female, or transexual couples.
A rabbit. In US, could also be a slang term referring to a sexually attractive young woman.
